+extern crate orphan_check_diagnostics;
+

+
+trait LocalTrait {}
+
+impl<T> RemoteTrait for T where T: LocalTrait {}
+//~^ ERROR type parameter `T` must be used as the type parameter for some local type
+
+fn main() {}
